channel.title: Product Hunt 热门
channel.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

item.title: makememe.ai - 通过提供描述，在5秒内制作一个备忘录
item.description: 以你的文字作为输入，人工智能系统将选择一个相关的备忘录，并将你的文字叠加在一起，希望给你和其他人带来快速的欢笑。我们希望你和你的朋友喜欢创造备忘录。
item.content:encoded: With your text as an input, the AI system will select a relevant meme and overlay your text with hopes to give you and others a quick laugh. We hope you and your friends enjoy creating memes.

item.title: Lockscreen Tasks - 在你的锁屏上看到你的任务列表
item.description: 在你的锁屏上看到你的任务列表。如何使用它？- 将任务添加到列表中 - 选择优先级 - 点击设备框架 - 输出 - 设置为锁屏 https://twitter.com/vyshnav_xyz/status/1475784509790601216?s=20
item.content:encoded: See your tasks list on your lock screen. How to use it? - Add tasks to the list - Choose priority - Click on the device frame - Export - Set as Lock screen https://twitter.com/vyshnav_xyz/status/1475784509790601216?s=20

item.title: Daily Prompt Web-App - 每天只需15分钟，就能取得作家的日常进步
item.description: 每天向你的写作目标迈进。📚 1000多个写作提示库🗣 给予和接受关于如何改进的反馈📅 使写作成为一种习惯，成为一个更好的作家🖥 在iOS和现在的网络上!
item.content:encoded: Make daily progress towards your writing goals.📚 Library of 1000+ writing prompts🗣 Give and receive feedback on how to improve📅 Make writing a habit and become a better writer🖥 On iOS and now on web!

item.title: Snakeplant - 谷歌幻灯片的矢量图标
item.description: Snakeplant是一个不断增长的谷歌幻灯片的矢量图标集，从羽毛图标集开始。Snakeplant是Neil Shankar（@tallneil）创建的一个独立项目。
item.content:encoded: Snakeplant is a growing collection of vector icons for Google Slides, starting with the Feather icon collection. Snakeplant is an independent project created by Neil Shankar (@tallneil).

item.title: Currsive - 写下你自己的故事，让别人听。
item.description: Currsive是一个平台，它允许作家写出伟大的引人入胜的故事，并让用户听同样的故事！你可以写，也可以让用户听。甚至你也可以写并拥有你自己的音频博客。你也可以分享它，并将它嵌入你的博客中! 是什么阻止了你？我们很想听!
item.content:encoded: Currsive is a platform that allows writers to write great engaging stories and lets users listen to the same! Even you can write and have your own audio blogs. You can also share it and embed it on your blog! What's stopping you? We are excited to listen!

item.title: baloonNFT - 使用信用卡的Mint NFT
item.description: 我们正在使NFT变得简单，为简单的人服务。没有钱包？没有加密货币？没问题! 用真钱铸造NFT。
item.content:encoded: We are making NFT simple, for simple people. No wallet? No crypto? No problem! Mint NFT from real money.

item.title: Crypto 3D Icons - 48个可定制的时尚3D图标，适用于任何加密货币产品
item.description: 这是一个适合任何加密产品的定制3D图标包。用这些手工制作的图标创建令人惊叹的、独特的项目，在Figma中可轻松编辑。三维图标太震撼了!
item.content:encoded: It's a pack of custom 3D icons suitable for any crypto product. Create stunning, unique projects with these hand crafted icons, easily editable in Figma. 3D icons rock!

item.title: Article to Audio Conversion Kit - 将你的 "必做 "阅读变成随身听
item.description: 将文章、摘要或通讯转换为高质量的音频通读，为记忆量身定做，帮助你更快地获得你需要知道的东西。
item.content:encoded: Convert articles, summaries or newsletters into high quality audio readthroughs tailored for memory and helping you get what you need to know faster.

item.title: NativeBase v3 Figma Kit - 免费的Figma UI套件，用于构建您的下一个网络和移动应用程序
item.description: 一个Figma设计工具包，可以模拟NativeBase的所有实用道具。无缝地将风格指南、UI组件和页面整合到您的网络和移动应用程序中。
item.content:encoded: A Figma design kit that emulates all of the utility props from NativeBase. Seamlessly integrate style guides, UI components, and pages into your web and mobile apps.

item.title: Scale To The Moon - 专门为电子商务制作的资源库
item.description: 为你的电子商务业务更快地找到工具和服务。减少100多个小时的研究时间，200多个工具供你使用。旨在帮助企业家、电子商务业主或任何着手开始自己业务的人。
item.content:encoded: Find tools and services faster for your eCommerce business. Reduce 100+ hours of research time, 200+ tools at your disposal. Designed to help entrepreneurs, eCommerce owners or anyone setting out to start their own business.

item.title: 100DaysOfNoCode Challenge - 在100天内学会无代码
item.description: 通过承诺参加100天无代码挑战来学习无代码。它有3条规则。1. 公开承诺 2. 每天至少学习30分钟的无代码课程 3. 分享你的进展 获得免费的每日课程，直接发送到你的收件箱。现在承诺。从2022年1月1日开始 ⚡
item.content:encoded: Learn to no-code by committing to the 100DaysOfNoCode challenge. It has 3 rules: 1. Publicly commit 2. Learn to no-code for at least 30 mins every day 3. Share your progress Get free daily lessons straight to your inbox. Commit now. Start Jan 1st, 2022 ⚡

item.title: Tesla Version 11.0 - 特斯拉迄今最大的假期发布
item.description: 介绍了特斯拉最具创意的一些功能，从让你根据自己的音乐编排灯光秀的新灯光秀功能，到新的游戏和娱乐体验、安全功能、可定制的控制和全新的用户界面设计。
item.content:encoded: Introducing some of Tesla's most creative features, from a new Light Show function that lets you choreograph light shows to your own music, to new games and entertainment experiences, safety features, customizable controls and an all-new user-interface design.

item.title: Postly - 社会媒体营销变得简单
item.description: 有了Postly，你可以一次写好你的社交媒体帖子，并在最流行的社交媒体平台上发布。实时平台 Facebook Instagram Twitter LinkedIn YouTube Pinterest TikTok Reddit 即将推出 WordPress WhatsApp RSS Feed
item.content:encoded: With Postly you can write your Social Media Post once, and Publish it on the most popular social media platforms: LIVE PLATFORMS Facebook Instagram Twitter LinkedIn YouTube Pinterest TikTok Reddit COMING SOON WordPress WhatsApp RSS Feed

item.title: Writex.io - 一个拥有超能力的在线编辑
item.description: 具有超能力的在线编辑。定制你的写作经验，建立你的维基，使用人工智能分析的力量来检查可读性和语音质量，使用极其先进的20多种语言的拼写检查，输出你的书。写得更聪明。
item.content:encoded: Online editor with super powers. Customise your writing experience, build your Wikis, use power of AI analysis to check readability and phonetic quality, use extremely advanced spell check for more than 20 languages, export your books. Write smarter.

item.title: My Year in Review - 在几分钟内反思你的2021年
item.description: myyearinreview帮助你以一种简单、有指导性和有趣的方式反思你的一年。
item.content:encoded: myyearinreview helps you reflect on your year in a simple, guided and fun way

item.title: Notion Diary - 将你的概念网页引导到一个博客网站上
item.description: 一个简单的应用程序，将你的概念页面引导到一个博客网站。没有更多复杂的设置，用户可以简单地登录并添加数据库ID，仅此而已。此外，用户可以添加他们的社会链接以增加他们的影响力。展示: https://www.notiondiary.xyz/lakshya
item.content:encoded: A simple application that bootstraps your notion pages to a blog site. No more complicated setups, users can simply log in and add database id, that's it. Moreover, user can add their social links to increase their reach. Showcase: https://www.notiondiary.xyz/lakshya

item.title: PipeCandy Prospector - 关于全球电子商务和DTC公司的基本事实
item.description: PipeCandy现在是唯一一家跟踪所有年收入不低于1万美元的电子商务公司的公司。随着这次推出，我们还跟踪了15万个DTC品牌。
item.content:encoded: PipeCandy is now the only company that tracks all eCommerce companies with at least $10,000 annual revenue. With this launch, we also track 150,000 DTC brands.

item.title: Sendspark for Linkedin - 用Linkedin上的视频推动更多的销售会议
item.description: 在LinkedIn的视频推广中，看到的回复多达4倍之多! 只需安装Sendspark Chrome扩展，就可以直接从Sales Navigator和LinkedIn信息合成器中录制和插入视频。
item.content:encoded: See up to 4x more replies from LinkedIn outreach with video! Just install the Sendspark Chrome Extension to record and insert videos right from Sales Navigator and the LinkedIn message composer.

item.title: Product Ideas On-Demand - 获得符合你的兴趣、技能和项目的想法
item.description: 我们利用人工智能（带有人情味），根据你的兴趣、技能和过去的项目，产生产品创意。
item.content:encoded: We leverage AI (with a human touch) to generate product ideas based on your interests, skills, and past projects.

item.title: Product Prediction - 我让GPT-3猜测一下顶级制造商接下来会建造什么东西
item.description: 我喜欢用GPT-3产生创意，我有一个想法，用顶级（也是我最喜欢的）制造商创造的产品来喂它，然后我告诉它预测他们的下一个项目是什么。我认为结果很有趣
item.content:encoded: I love generating ideas with GPT-3 and I had an idea to feed it with products created by the top (and my favorite) makers and then I told it to predict what their next projects will be. I thought the results were interesting!

item.title: Momento - 极简主义的生活提醒
item.description: Momento是一个帮助你采取行动的工具。你的生命是非常宝贵的，所以要让它变得有价值。
item.content:encoded: Momento is a tool to help you take action. Your life is very precious so make it worth it.

item.title: Chord Commerce - 无头商业很困难，我们让它变得简单
item.description: Chord是一个为快速增长的D2C品牌提供的商务即服务软件。我们为商业公司提供一个灵活的（无头）技术栈，它完全配备了复杂的数据洞察力，以实现最佳的客户体验。
item.content:encoded: Chord is a commerce-as-a-service software for fast-growing D2C brands. We offer a flexible (headless) tech stack for commerce companies that is fully equipped with sophisticated data insights for the optimal customer experience.

item.title: 1Tagline - 营销大师帮助制作令人惊叹的文本
item.description: 从伟大的营销人员那里获得建议，他们可以帮助你为你的产品或文章精心制作吸引人的标语。
item.content:encoded: Get advice from the great marketers who can help you craft catchy taglines for your product or article.

item.title: DeepLobe - 你的无代码机器学习平台
item.description: 一个为释放计算机视觉和自动化的力量而建立的无代码机器学习平台。它是一个智能的、可扩展的、具有成本效益的ML API即服务平台，可训练和整合最先进的机器学习和深度学习。
item.content:encoded: A no-code machine learning platform built to unleash the power of computer vision and automation. It's a smart, scalable, cost-effective ML API as a service platform that trains and integrates state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning.

item.title: Flip Clock - 网络上著名的翻转钟
item.description: 这是我们在互联网上看到的著名的翻转钟的网络版。
item.content:encoded: This is the web version of the famous flip clock that we see all over the internet

item.title: Voiceliner - 勇敢的人更好。
item.description: 捕捉和组织你的想法的最快方式：通过声音。保持记录，说话，然后释放。就像你所期望的那样，从大纲中创建层次结构并重新排列。笔记是自动转录和可搜索的。本地优先和开放源代码。
item.content:encoded: The fastest way to capture and structure your thoughts: through voice. Hold record, speak, and release. Just like you'd expect from an outliner, create hierarchies and rearrange. Notes are auto-transcribed and searchable. Local-first and open source.

item.title: BRICKS Design System - 一个免费的、可定制的MaterialUI设计系统
item.description: BRICKS是一个完整的设计系统，基于! ♻️开源 🔥 50+组件 🎨设计令牌系统 📚嵌入式互动文档 🌗黑暗模式
item.content:encoded: BRICKS is a full Design System, based on ! ♻️ Open source 🔥 50+ components 🎨 Design Tokens system 📚 Embedded Interactive documentation 🌗 Dark mode

item.title: rewalt - 为你所有未使用的奖赏提供市场
item.description: 介绍一下rewalt - 一个所有未使用奖励的社区市场。奖励/优惠券的类型： 1.亚马逊支付奖励 2.谷歌支付奖励 3.其他奖励。谷歌支付奖励 3. PhonePe奖励 4. Walmart/Target/Best Buy 奖励 6. 所有类型的可转让奖励/优惠券
item.content:encoded: Introducing rewalt - A community marketplace for all the unused rewards. Type of rewards/coupons: 1. Amazon Pay Rewards 2. Google Pay Rewards 3. PhonePe Rewards 4. Walmart/Target/Best Buy Rewards 6. All types of transferrable rewards/coupons

item.title: St0nk - 向你的朋友和家人赠送印度股票
item.description: 嘿，Product Hunt，Swadesh又回来了，他带来了另一个宝石级的产品。你可以向你的朋友和家人赠送印度股票，这将是一个非常有趣的圣诞礼物。它现在对美国的任何人都开放!
item.content:encoded: Hey Product Hunt, Swadesh is back with another gem of a drop. You can gift Indian stocks to your friends and family which will be a really interesting Christmas gift. It’s open to anyone in the United States right now!

item.title: Wikifox - 维基百科的重新构想--干净、简化、强大
item.description: 维基福克斯（测试版）是真正的维基百科的一个干净和简化的版本! 这与官方的维基百科一起工作，所以没有什么可担心的！。它有一个很好的、干净的用户界面，有深色、浅色和自定义主题! 请看：https://wikifox.ml/
item.content:encoded: Wikifox (beta) is a clean and simplified version of the real Wikipedia! This works with official Wikipedia, so nothing to worry about!. It has a good and clean user interface with Dark, Light and custom themes! Check it out : https://wikifox.ml/

item.title: Flickcall - 在你喜欢的流媒体平台上一起观看
item.description: Flickcall是一个注重隐私的浏览器扩展，可以一起观看电影和电视节目。你的个人聊天和视频流直接传递给同伴（没有后端服务器）。支持Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5。
item.content:encoded: Flickcall is a privacy-focused browser extension to watch movies & TV shows together. Your personal chats & video stream are delivered directly to peers (without backend servers). Supports Netflix, Youtube, Primevideo, Hotstar, & Zee5.

item.title: Otis House - IRL 🤝 NFT
item.description: Otis House是一个建立在以太坊之上的市场、拍卖平台和实体物品的保险库。实物项目由奥的斯储存、保护和保险。然后，我们为每件物品铸造一个NFT，代表该资产的所有权。
item.content:encoded: Otis House is a marketplace, auction platform, and vault for physical items, built on top of Ethereum. The physical items are stored, secured, and insured by Otis. We then mint an NFT for each item representing ownership of the asset.

item.title: TechSpecs VS - 能为你自动比较智能手机的人工智能
item.description: 产品猎手们好，不要再手动比较智能手机了。使用TechSpecs的人工智能技术，自动比较并找到最好的智能手机。
item.content:encoded: Hello Product hunters, Stop comparing smartphones manually. Use TechSpecs AI technology to automatically compare and find the best smartphone.

item.title: WAGMI Cards - 通过WAGMI礼品卡将$MATIC送给你的亲人。
item.description: 您是否正在寻找一种方法，将您的朋友和家人介绍给神奇的加密货币世界？这个假期，使用Wagmi.Cards给他们赠送一些MATIC
item.content:encoded: Looking for a way to introduce your friends and family to the magical world of Cryptocurrency? This holiday season, use Wagmi.Cards to gift them some MATIC

item.title: Icon Shelf - 一个为网站开发者提供的免费图标管理器
item.description: Icon Shelf是一个免费和开源的SVG图标管理器，适用于网页开发人员。改善你向你的前端项目添加图标的方式。你所有的图标都在一个地方，容易作为代码复制。
item.content:encoded: Icon Shelf is a free and open-source SVG icon manager for web developers. Improve how you add icons to your frontend project. All your icons in one place, easily copyable as code.

item.title: The Ultimate Mouse Mover - 保持你的电脑处于 "工作 "模式，而无需触摸鼠标
item.description: 这个软件可以让你在你的Windows电脑上模拟真实的鼠标运动! 最重要的是你得到了源代码，并保证无病毒! 不要再担心你的电脑注销或工作状态改变。始终保持在线!
item.content:encoded: This software allows you to simulate real mouse movements on your Windows PC! Most importantly you get the source code & guarantee virus-free! Don't worry anymore about your computer logging off or the work status changing. Stay always Online!

item.title: minulle - 在上传前预览YouTube缩略图和标题
item.description: minulle允许你在YouTube的主页、搜索和订阅页面上预览你的YouTube缩略图和标题。我挑战自己，在短短3个小时内建立一个SaaS应用程序，这就是这个结果🚀。
item.content:encoded: minulle allows you to preview your YouTube thumbnails and titles on the home, search and the subscription page of YouTube. I challenged myself to build a SaaS app in just 3 hours and this is the result of that 🚀

item.title: OrgPad - 一个简单易行的应用程序，解放了你的思维
item.description: OrgPad是一个通用工具。它适用于计划、头脑风暴、演示、存储信息，但它也适用于长期工作，如为考试学习或跟踪项目。一开始，它会让你想起思维导图，但它的功能远不止于此!
item.content:encoded: OrgPad is a universal tool. It is good for planning, brainstorming, presentations, storing information, but it's also good for long-term work like learning for an exam or tracking a project. At first, it'll remind you of Mind Maps but it's so much more!

item.title: Image to Cartoon - 最好的在线AI漫画家，免费的
item.description: ImagetoCartoon是一个在线人工智能卡通化器，可以将你的脸转换成卡通或动漫风格。不仅可以制作卡通头像，还可以自己制作表情符号。由最好的人工智能技术提供支持，你可以在几秒钟内将图像转换为卡通。
item.content:encoded: ImagetoCartoon is an online AI cartoonizer that could convert your face to cartoon or anime style. Not only make cartoon avatars but also emoji yourself. Powered by the best AI technology, you can convert image to cartoon in seconds.

item.title: Glitché NFT Tool - 点击几下就可以创建NFT艺术
item.description: 新版本的Glitché是一个完美的NFT-艺术工具，它的glitch-filters是基于无法重现的随机数据。从你的相机胶卷中最多有三个视频的数据，或实验实时记录。
item.content:encoded: New version of Glitché is a perfect NFT-art tool with glitch-filters based on random data that cannot be recreated. Datamosh up to three videos from your camera roll or experiment with real-time recording.

item.title: HomeMovie - 一起创造回忆
item.description: HomeMovie让人们重温摄像机的怀旧情怀，并有了新的变化。与朋友一起创作和录制。当你捕捉到这一时刻时，你会看到磁带上每个人的所有剪辑都会出现。这是一种有趣的方式，可以一起创造回忆!
item.content:encoded: HomeMovie brings back the nostalgia of the Camcorder with a twist. Create and record together with friends. As you capture the moment, you see all clips from everyone on the tape come in as they happen. It's a fun way to create memories together!

item.title: Fugo TV Dashboards - 在电视屏幕上安全地分享商业智能数据
item.description: 到目前为止，很少有办法在整个组织中大规模地分享关键数据。电视仪表板让你取代不必要的会议、中断、电子邮件和链接共享，把你的数据放在工作场所的电视屏幕上让所有人看到。
item.content:encoded: Until now, there have been few ways to share critical data across whole organizations at scale. TV Dashboards let you replace unnecessary meetings, interruptions, emails & link sharing by putting your data up on your workplace TV screens for all to see.

item.title: Pokoy - 用于冥想的斐波那契计时器
item.description: 用于冥想的应用程序。它利用你对时间估计的认知偏差，鼓励你更经常地进行冥想。
item.content:encoded: App for Meditation. It uses your cognitive biases of time estimates and encourages you to meditate more often.

item.title: YouTube Transcripts 2.0 - SEO优化的YouTube成绩单，现在只需点击一下就可以了
item.description: 如果没有SEO，你不会指望在谷歌上获得高排名。- 视频转录对于YT算法知道你的视频是关于什么的至关重要。自动生成的不算数。- 获得快速、准确和便宜的转录，让你获得你应得的浏览量。
item.content:encoded: You wouldn't expect to rank highly on Google without SEO. - Video transcriptions are crucial for the YT algorithm to know what your video is about. Auto-generated ones don't count. - Get fast, accurate and cheap transcriptions to get you the views you deserve.

item.title: Elecjet Apollo Ultra - 最快充电的电源箱
item.description: 介绍阿波罗Ultra，世界上最快的充电电源。由于石墨烯的增强，这款10,000mAh的电源银行在27分钟内就能以100W的功率自我充电。你甚至可以用高达85W的功率为你所有的设备快速充电。
item.content:encoded: Introducing Apollo Ultra, The World’s Fastest Charging Power Bank. Thanks to graphene enhancement, this 10,000mAh power bank charges itself at 100W in just under 27 minutes. You can even fast charge all of your devices with up to 85W of power.

item.title: BikeSpot - 我们帮助你探索我们的世界，认识冒险家
item.description: BikeSpot.fr是一个用于分享和下载GPS自行车路线的众包应用。我们的使命。让骑行者发现未曾探索过的地方，并将他们联系在一起。在BikeSpot上寻找您的下一次骑行
item.content:encoded: BikeSpot.fr is a crowdsourced app for sharing and downloading GPS bike routes. Our mission: Allow riders discovering the unexplored and connect them together. Find your next ride on BikeSpot!

item.title: D2C Hunt - 找到数百个你可以合作的D2C品牌
item.description: D2C Hunt帮助你找到数以百计的品牌 印度D2C品牌（直接面向消费者的品牌），你可以与之合作! 节省了你数百个小时的谷歌搜索和滚动浏览Instagram的时间。
item.content:encoded: D2C Hunt helps you find hundreds of brands Indian D2C brands ( Direct to consumer brands) you can collaborate with!! Saves you hundreds of hours of googling and scrolling through Instagram.

item.title: Newsly 2.0 - 用自然的人声读出最热门的新闻和文章
item.description: Newsly撷取了网络上最热门的话题，并以自然的声音进行解读。现在你可以关注你能想到的任何话题，无论是NFT、Metaverse还是卡戴珊家族 整个网络都变得可听了! 现在还提供播客、阅读模式和天气。
item.content:encoded: Newsly picks up the most trending topics on the web and reads them in a natural voice. Now you can follow any topic you can think of, be it NFT, Metaverse, or The Kardashians! The entire web becomes listenable! Now also with podcasts, read mode and weather.

item.title: Outlet Finance - 用DeFi取代你的银行账户
item.description: 奥特莱斯金融应用程序允许你用一个简单和易于使用的加密货币钱包取代你的银行账户，该钱包是为非加密货币人士设计的。
item.content:encoded: The Outlet Finance app allows your to replace your bank account with a simple and easy to use crypto wallet that is designed for the non crypto person.

item.title: Fugue 3.0 - 新鲜的音乐，让你的视频变得很有活力
item.description: 为视频寻找合适的音乐可能是一个挑战。而购买适当的许可证也是很棘手的。这就是为什么新的《赋格》有5倍的精选曲目和简单的定价。因此，你可以在预算范围内获得更多的音乐。
item.content:encoded: Finding the right music for a video can be challenging. And buying a proper license can be tricky. That's why the new Fugue comes with 5X more curated tracks and simple pricing. So you can get more music on a budget.
